overview:
Abdullah is a determined, independent and details-oriented business professional and entrepreneur . He is holding a marketing and business management degree from Kuwait University and is a member of International Public Relations Association.

As the Managing Director of BRIO Communications, Abdullah has managed the marketing and communications needs for many leading companies and brands including Telecom, Banking, Investment, Real-Estate, Retail and services companies in Kuwait, Switzerland, United Kingdom, Egypt, Saudi Arabia and Qatar. In BRIO, Abdullah introduced many alternative media solutions to the market.

Abdullah is also the founder of wawyaa.com the user-generated web magazine with daily coverage of everything inspiring, covering inspirational and creative topics from art, design, architecture to technology and start ups.

Abdullah also held the position of Chairman for leading real estate development companies in the GCC and senior MPR management positions in regional insurance companies.

Abdullaâ€™s areas of expertise include brand management, social media, media planning, marketing and and strategic planning
